title: Patriots dealing with illness spreading in locker room ahead of Chargers playoff game
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots Three players on New England's offensive line missed practice on Wednesday due to illness.

title: Firefighters rescued a ‘silly goose’ after she fell through the ice on Cape Cod
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The 4-year-old golden retriever was stranded about 200 feet out from the shore of Goose Pond in Chatham, fire officials said.
Chatham fire officials rescued a 4-year-old golden retriever after she fell through the ice on Goose Pond.
Chatham Fire Department A silly goose had to be rescued after she fell through the ice at the fittingly-named Goose Pond.

title: Pilot killed in Provincetown crash identified as Attleboro resident
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The man was the sole victim of a “devastating accident” after the plane he was piloting crashed and caught fire.
An Attleboro man was killed after the plane he was piloting crashed and caught fire at Provincetown Municipal Airport.
Barry Chin/The Boston Globe By Darin Zullo January 7, 2026 | 6:36 PM 1 minute to read A pilot who died Sunday in a Provincetown plane crash has been identified, according to prosecutors.

title: Lindsay Clancy’s lawyer warns she could kill herself if medical needs not met during murder trial
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime “She’s not a danger to others, that’s for sure.
But she’s surely a danger to herself,” said an attorney for Clancy, who is charged with killing her children.
Lindsay Clancy appeared via Zoom from Tewksbury Hospital for a hearing on Sept.

title: Cardi B was spotted in the produce section of a Mass. Star Market
author: Shannon Murphy
bullets: Celebs “Get ready with me while I tell you guys about how I met Cardi B at the grocery store yesterday.
” Even Grammy-winning artists have to run errands at the supermarket sometimes.
In a video posted on TikTok, Lanasia Bentley retells her chance encounter with hip hop star Cardi B while doing some shopping at around 2 pm on New Year’s Day.

title: Person hospitalized, 2 pets killed in South Boston fire
author: Shannon Murphy
bullets: Local News Damages are estimated at around $600,000.
The Boston Fire Department battled a house fire in South Boston Tuesday night.

title: Some Kelly’s Roast Beef locations close in Florida
author: Katelyn Umholtz
bullets: Food News The remaining Florida restaurants “are expected to follow a similar transition.
" Three locations of Kelly's Roast Beef in Florida have closed.

Handout Several locations of Kelly’s Roast Beef in Florida have closed for good, according to a press release from the private equity firm that became the new owners of the North Shore sandwich shop last year.

title: Boston nightclub says it handled a woman’s fatal medical episode properly. Her loved ones disagree.
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News A woman collapsed on the dancefloor of ICON, a club in Boston's Theater District, last month and died.
The exterior of ICON, a nightclub in Boston where a woman suffered a fatal medical episode.

title: GameStop to scale back nationwide, closing roughly 12 stores in Mass.
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Business The closures come as the chain navigates financial turmoil long after its 2021 meme-stock fame.
